data.title: SN8 | Ep357 - Ben Stewart | Filmmaker by The Jeremiah Show
data.meta_description: Play SN8 | Ep357 - Ben Stewart | Filmmaker by The Jeremiah Show on desktop and mobile. Play over 320 million tracks for free on SoundCloud.
data.text:
published on 2021-03-19T02:58:03Z

The Art of Awakening... Filmmaker, Artist, & Lifestyle Consultant Ben Stewart is our special guest today! Ben is the creator of Esoteric Agenda, Kymatica, Ungrip, Psychedelica, Limitless, The Magic Plant, and new series Waking Infinity. His newest film is the incredible documentary "DMT Quest" Wim Hof, also known as The Iceman, is a Dutch extreme athlete noted for his ability to withstand freezing temperatures. He has set Guinness World Records for swimming under ice and prolonged full-body contact with ice, and previously held the record for a barefoot half marathon on ice and snow. He says of Ben's documentary, DMT Quest: âA fantastic documentary I recommend to you all! Lots of interesting insights from the latest study on the endogenous DMT. The depth of your brain, available at will, for everyone to tap into. Just BREATHE! - Wim Hof www.benjosephstewart.com

Genre

Entertainment
